boardgame.name: Sails of Glory
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sails of Glory is a series of games that recreates naval combat in the Age of Sails (1650-1815). Based on the game system used in Wings of Glory (formerly Wings of War), Sails of Glory uses miniatures, cards and board game mechanisms, with a special deck of maneuver cards representing the different movement capabilities of each vessel. The game will be supported by a range of painted and assembled 1/1000 miniatures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will choose their maneuver cards in secret, then reveal them all at the same moment. The card features arrows to be put in front of the miniature, then the latter is moved on top of the arrowhead. Several options on the same card are available depending on the wind and, with advanced rules, the sails used. After all ships moved, guns are fired from the sides of the miniature to targets in range._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Wings of Glory game system has been modified and expanded to accurately represent battles at sea between the large sailing ships of the past centuries. The first series of Sails of Glory will be set in the Napoleonic Age. If the game is successful, in the future Sails of Glory will be extended to cover other historical periods, such as the Age of Discovery, the Middle Ages and ancient times._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 UK Games Expo Best Miniatures Range Winner
2015 Origins Awards Best Historical Miniature Rules Nominee

for Greenlabormike

Kickstarter base game with stretch goals for Mate level--the wooden ruler and wind gauge, captain and crew quality deck, and terrain pack #2, Plus four sets of the smoke clouds. Plus, the four Kickstarter-exclusive ships, which they say will never be sold. the French frigate La Concorde, the French ship-of-the-line Fougueux, the British frigate HMS Juno, and the British ship-of-the-line HMS Bellerophon. All items new and unopened.
Base game
Base game + 2 HMS ships. All still in shrink. I bought this then realized a friend had everything.
Sails of Glory Starter Set, Coasts and Shoals, and Coastal Batteries. All in Shrink Wrap
Sails of Glory Starter Set, Coasts and Shoals, and Coastal Batteries. All in Shrink Wrap
Opened unpunched comes with play mat, coasts and shoals and coastal batteries. Plus 2 extra ships the French Berwick and the HMS Bellona.

Ares Games (ARESGN001A) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;England expects that every man will do his duty..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; -Admiral Nelson addressing his men at Trafalgar. In Sails of Glory you will sail and fight with massive ships-of-the-line or swift frigates, in an age where the armies and fleets of the French Emperor Napoleon I battled across the seas, as well as on the fields of Europe, and the powerful Royal Navy of the British Empire clashed against the French from the Atlantic Ocean to the Mediterranean Sea, in dramatic naval battles, such as Trafalgar and the Battle of the Nile. This Starter Set is a complete game for 2-4 players, and also the entry point to a game system that allows players to recreate the epic naval battles of the of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Age of Sail_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Fast playing and easy-to-learn, Sails of Glory uses pre-painted and assembled ship miniatures and an innovative movement mechanic, inspired by the acclaimed system used in our Wings of Glory game. Four ships, two French and two British, are included, each ship complemented by a specific maneuver deck and ship log. Also included is a full color rulebook, counters, and accessories, to start playing out of the box in mere minutes.

Ares Games (ARESGN001A) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;England expects that every man will do his duty..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; -Admiral Nelson addressing his men at Trafalgar. In Sails of Glory you will sail and fight with massive ships-of-the-line or swift frigates, in an age where the armies and fleets of the French Emperor Napoleon I battled across the seas, as well as on the fields of Europe, and the powerful Royal Navy of the British Empire clashed against the French from the Atlantic Ocean to the Mediterranean Sea, in dramatic naval battles, such as Trafalgar and the Battle of the Nile. This Starter Set is a complete game for 2-4 players, and also the entry point to a game system that allows players to recreate the epic naval battles of the of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Age of Sail_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Fast playing and easy-to-learn, Sails of Glory uses pre-painted and assembled ship miniatures and an innovative movement mechanic, inspired by the acclaimed system used in our Wings of Glory game. Four ships, two French and two British, are included, each ship complemented by a specific maneuver deck and ship log. Also included is a full color rulebook, counters, and accessories, to start playing out of the box in mere minutes.
